HowRetainiWorks.title: How Retaini Works
HowRetainiWorks.description: Retaini allows your loyal customers to help grow your business â€“ by sharing codes, inviting friends, and earning rewards for their loyalty.

1.title: Adding a Customer
1.description: Add a loyal customer to the system by entering their name and email. Retaini will generate two QR codes: one for sharing with friends and another for customer identification. A welcome email with instructions on how to use the code is automatically sent to the customer.

2.title: Customer Shares, New Visitor Arrives
2.description: The loyal customer shares their QR code or invitation link with a friend. When a new visitor arrives and shows this code, you simply scan it. The system automatically identifies which loyal customer shared the code and displays what the new visitor receives based on your reward plan.

3.title: Reward Achieved
3.description: When the number of referrals reaches the set threshold, the loyal customer is automatically added to the list of reward recipients. This will be clearly visible on the main dashboard. At the same time, a notification is sent to the customer reminding them of their pending reward.

4.title: Loyal Customer Returns
4.description: When the customer returns, they can be easily identified in the system â€“ by scanning their personal identification QR code or searching by email. The system will show whether the customer is eligible for a reward and how much is left until the next one.
